title: Installation issue: gcc@9.3.0
body:
`libisl` is not available when building gcc@9.3.0. In my build environment, no previous version of libisl is available either in spack or from the system- only the version installed from concretizing gcc@9.3.0 is around.

     >> 9513    /tmp/haines8/spack-stage/spack-stage-gcc-9.3.0-pagj2qrnnfbadrimrj5skhodj7mwqupi/spack-src/spack-build/./gcc/cc1:
    error while loading shared libraries: libisl.so.19: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Checking the dependencies...

    [haines8@ray23:tests]$ ldd /tmp/haines8/spack-stage/spack-stage-gcc-9.3.0-pagj2qrnnfbadrimrj5skhodj7mwqupi/spack-src/spack-build/./gcc/cc1 | sort
      /lib64/ld64.so.2 (0x0000100000000000)
      libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00001000003a0000)
      libdl.so.2 => /lib64/libdl.so.2 (0x0000100000240000)
      libgmp.so.10 => /lib64/libgmp.so.10 (0x0000100000190000)
      libisl.so.19 => not found
      libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00001000002b0000)
      libmpc.so.3 => /lib64/libmpc.so.3 (0x00001000000c0000)
      libmpfr.so.4 => /lib64/libmpfr.so.4 (0x0000100000100000)
      libz.so.1 => /lib64/libz.so.1 (0x0000100000270000)
      linux-vdso64.so.1 =>  (0x0000100000050000)

I would expect libisl to be RPATH'ed at this point in the build... Since it's installed by spack at this point, I can manually load its module.

    [haines8@ray23:tests]$ module load isl-0.20-gcc-7.3.1-qjqn5pv

Checking LD_LIBRARY_PATH, it's now visible.

    [haines8@ray23:tests]$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
    /usr/WS1/haines8/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-7.3.1/isl-0.20-qjqn5pv4zliaihpbtqywu3dhudvbaugx/lib
    /usr/WS1/haines8/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-7.3.1/perl-5.30.1-bbeqdt7wshfovaqlf3xosmdcxjcbpq22/lib
    /usr/WS1/haines8/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-7.3.1/intel-tbb-2020.1-fk5tidvubuk4bgu25qfegsvd4y4iju7d/lib
    /usr/WS1/haines8/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-7.3.1/boost-1.70.0-a7lpiqaxpckjhztzfl2dtsquu2dsii6m/lib
    /usr/WS1/haines8/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-7.3.1/elfutils-0.178-tggrh3bouc2pejqronoza4a6g3knaxdh/lib
    /usr/tce/packages/cuda/cuda-10.1.243/lib64
    /opt/ibm/spectrumcomputing/lsf/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-ppc64le-csm/lib

But the build still fails. The complete build logs are below.

[gcc.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4472380/gcc.log)
[spack-cc-gcc-pagj2qr.in.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4472381/spack-cc-gcc-pagj2qr.in.log)
[spack-cc-gcc-pagj2qr.out.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4472382/spack-cc-gcc-pagj2qr.out.log)

        Linux ray23 3.10.0-957.21.3.1chaos.ch6.ppc64le #1 SMP Tue Jun 25 09:02:47 PDT 2019 ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux
    $ lsb_release -d
